product_name: Patagonia Down Sweater Bunting - Infant Girls' - 2012 Closeout
long_description: You and your little one will appreciate the extraordinary warmth the Patagonia Down Sweater bunting provides. Ripstop polyester fabric with Durable Water Repellent treatment is snag- and water-resistant. High-quality 600-fill-power goose down is warm, lightweight and compressible. Spandex trim around hood, sleeves and leg cuffs helps retain heat; hand covers are designed to allow full extension for little arms. Front dual zips with windflaps allow easy on/off, and the zipper on the inside of the legs offers easy access for diaper changes. Down Sweater bunting has convertible bag-to-split-leg styling for use in a carseat or backpack. Relaxed fit accommodates layers. 100% recyclable through Patagonia's Common Threads Recycling Program-simply return your worn-out item to Patagonia.
short_description: You and your little one will appreciate the extraordinary warmth the Patagonia Down Sweater bunting provides.
